attributes.action: Rescue British citizens stranded abroad due to covid 19
attributes.additional_details: These are commonly young people travelling alone. The countries are in lockdown and food is scarce. There is often a lack of safe drinking water. My daughter is a healthcare professional who wants to come home to work. At the moment most are healthy. Please prevent the disastrous consequences of them becoming ill abroad.
attributes.background: Send rescue flights for the hundreds of citizens currently isolated and potentially at risk, especially in remote areas such as Honduras and Peru.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
